mutants.original_line: sources = [node for node, in_degree in G.in_degree() if in_degree == 0]
mutants.mutated_line: sources = [node for (node, in_degree) in G.in_degree() if in_degree != 0]

mutants.original_line: sinks = [node for node, out_degree in G.out_degree() if out_degree == 0]
mutants.mutated_line: sinks = [node for (node, out_degree) in G.out_degree() if out_degree != 0]
